caption: DAO - Fetch Proposals
doc: Fetch all the proposals for a DAO.

ANI.caption: DAO Contract Address
ANI.doc: The smart contract address of the DAO you are fetching information from.
ANI.name: vote_contract

ANJ.caption: RPC URL
ANJ.doc: Provide a RPC url for the network the DAO you are fetching information from is deployed on. Mainnet example: https://main-light.eth.linkpool.io
ANJ.name: default_provider
